ðŸ”§ Fix PROJECT_DIR placeholder substitution in mcp_config.json

Enhanced template initialization system to properly substitute {{PROJECT_DIR}}
placeholder in .claude/mcp_config.json file during project initialization.

This ensures all configuration files have correct paths after installation.

Changes:
- Added PROJECT_DIR placeholder substitution to copy_template_files()
- Enhanced template file detection to include mcp_config.json
- Added comprehensive placeholder logging for debugging
- Improved substitution logic for multiple placeholders
